评论详情: I ordered the black version. They arrived with the drawstring missing though the openings for it are intact. I am 5' 2" and they are barely long enough. I am not able to cuff them as pictured without the look of capris. They are warm and comfortable so I will keep them though they are overpriced for basic pull up pants.
Not corduroy at all. More like pajama pants. Returned them

Let me start out by saying that the fabric is great. It’s the cut of the pants that’s off. I tried to make them work but will be returning them. I am 5’7” and usually wear a size 14. I ordered an XL after reading the reviews. The crotch hangs too low, if I pull them wayp up past my belly button a few inches below my bra, they are too short. No one is going to wear them that way. They just fit in the thigh and they pull in an odd way when I bend my leg. The pattern is made for someone who is of a shorter stature with thin thighs and no backside.

评论概述: Just what I'd hoped for - except for fit
评论详情: The fabric and styling of these pants were just what I'd hoped for and because of this I thought of keeping them.  However, the fit was snug and I knew that after laundering they were likely to be too small.  Wish I'd ordered a size larger than my regular size -  they probably would have been just right after laundering.  Regrettably, I'll be returning them.
Better buy a bigger size if you want to feel comfortable. The quality of the material Is disappointing

评论概述: Great pants, loose leg, do not stay folded
评论详情: Love the comfort of these pants. They run true to size mostly, but I did find the legs a little long. They also do not stay folded up so keep that in mind when styling. Over all great fabric and look, but not versatile for every shoe since they won't stay folded
Comfortable and easy to wear

The Amazon description avoided saying what it was made of. I should have known. Polyester! Made in China! I thought I was ordering "corduroys"; that means cotton in my book. I'll see how we get on, but usually I don't do well with polyester; not even a mix. Ugh!

I  keep buying pair after pair. They are very flattering, comfortable, machine washable, and affordable.  I am wearing them this winter and match them with most of my tops. Far more attractive than sweatpants.

评论概述: Nice look for a casual pair of pants
评论详情: I like these so much ordered a second pair. I wore them on vacation packed nicely and were very comfy and looked nicer than jeans which I seem to wear all the time
Baggy in the crotch area but warm and comfy. Will be used as pjs.
Images show a high rise pair of pants and what I got sat WELL below my waist and were not at all loose fitting....

I got these and couldn’t even put them on because they smelt so bad. I’ve washed them at least 4 times all with different detergents with no luck. I’m super disappointed that the smell won’t go away. Wouldn’t but again for that reason alone.

评论概述: The fit is just as described in the information.  Very stretchy and soft!
评论详情: The pants fit just as described.  They are soft and stretchy, and the colors are beautiful!!

评论概述: Nice color and fabric but tight waistband
评论详情: What a shame! These pants look so nice and fit everywhere except my waist. Although it has an elastic waistband, it is too tight. The fabric is beautiful, heavy enough for winter but soft for comfort. I ordered size Medium. I am 5'3'' and 125lbs.

The quality of these pants is great, they are super soft inside and out. I sized up according to the description, I’m a size 6 but ordered a medium(8-10) and clearly I should have sized up more. They aren’t flattering at all and don’t look like the description pictures or fit the same. I was expecting an oversized look, and definitely didn’t get that. Sadly will be returning.
Love these pants. They are a tad long but I am a tad short.

This is a lightweight pant but a soft chunky corduroy material with a sweatband waist!  I wore them with boots one day AND with sneakers another.  I'm looking forward to wearing them with Birkenstocks when the weather changes too!  Slightly tapered ankle, they are more of a flattering fit, not a typical wide leg.

评论概述: just what i need for my flat bottom & not-so-flat belly
评论详情: perfect for muffin top 😊. Exactly as pictured
The cordoroy is a comfortable fabric.
These pants fit great and very stylish.
These are my favorite pants, they are so comfortable and warm. I think they are flattering while still being baggy. I wear them weekly and they have held up great over time.
Fit is terrible.  Stride to waist is cut wrong. Also very thin, lightweight material. Cheaply made! Avoid useless you enjoy returning items.

I like the fabric and find it very comfortable and soft. It isn’t thick corduroy, but think enough for me to wear during winter in Michigan. The biggest complaint I have is that these tend to slip down in the back (over my butt) as I move around. I haven’t been able to fix this issue no matter what I try. I’ve concluded that it’s the cut of the pattern. However, I have ordered another pair since I like them well enough to deal with discretely having to hitch my get-along once in a while.
I bring 3 pairs of these. Perfect fit and warm.

Seen these and had them in my cart a couple weeks and i’m weird about online pants shopping but boy i tell you what, most comfortable pants i own, true to size. i got a small, i’m 5’1 pant size like 3/5
Way to baggy and LONG

These are really nice pants but they fit a little tight. I’m 5’6 and 140lbs. I’m curvy through the behind and legs. I found this a little tight through the waist and thighs  for my comfort. They also look a little baggy through the lower leg. Overall just an odd fit for my body shape. The material is thick and warm and quality seems good.
I love the color and fit. The fabric quality is not too thick. I haven’t washed them yet so unable to comment on wash ability.
Nice feeling fabric but about 2 sizes smaller than my other pants this size so I couldn’t try them on.
These pants are just what I was looking for. Good fit,  nice corduroy fabric and a great price.  They look good on me as well.
Didn’t fit me well and looked cheaper in person.
Loved these...ordered several pair...love the fabric...warm for winter cold....fit was perfect....

I loved these pants so much that I immediately bought two more colors. I love corduroy pants when it’s cold outside and these didn’t disappoint. I bought one size larger than usual since I couldn’t try them on but I don’t think I needed to. Excellent for the price.
waistband is too tight. I sized up twice and still couldn't get a comfortable fit. Shame because they dont' look that bad. Don't be duped like I was by the cute pictures on the model.
I liked everything except the fit. I typically wear size 16/18 or XL in pants. These fit my waist, but are very tight in the hip/thigh area.
i love these panys they fit very well
I recently bought the brown pair on a whim and I am so glad I did! I wore them to work (business casual) with a nice top & they were perfect. I came back to buy them in black.

I was delighted to find these high-rise pants in a variety of colors. These black cords actually look black, not navy like another good quality brand! They are a good fit, well made, and an overall success.
5’7 120lbs and it’s wayyy to short even though the picture states the model is about same measurements. Very awkward fit however fabric was soft? lol returning

评论概述: Great fit if you like wide looose pants
评论详情: Love them
I like the color, like the material and happy to see that the pants fit so well.

I love these pants for teaching. I am an elementary teacher so I am always looking for some that is soft and able to move around in them easily and these definitely do that. I would 100% recommend these pants. The material is thick but it is good for when it is cold. This is worth your money. It is also true to size.
Very comfortable. Perfect fit! Good quality.
A thick corduroy. Can definitely be dressed up or casual. Super comfy.
Fits great
Size is to fit XL.  like the comfort and feel of the material. They wash well with no shrinkage.  Good value.
Suggested size was XL and it was to big !  The material was a little too thin and might not be good for very cold weather wear !  The pants over all were good !
Very comforable. Looks more dressy than sweat pants. True to size.

I float b/w pant sizes 10 - 12. Originally ordered an XL based on recommended size. Too big. Returned and ordered a Large and they fit perfect. So soft, comfy and stylish. Can be dressed down with sneakers or style with booties.
They are as pictured. Super comfy & I feel super cool wearing them so it’s feeding my nastalgia 🖤 They have pockets. The length & size were perfect so yeah, feelin groovy with them

These pants are very comfortable and I like the fabric. The waist fits true to size and comfortably as well. However! I purchased these because the stock image shows a more tapered leg, not a baggy straight leg. That is what these pants are. Baggy and straight leg. And that’s fine if that’s what you are looking for.  But that is not what I was looking for or trying to purchase. They also do not roll very well when trying to achieve the look in the stock image.
Like the pants, but I’m short, so they need to be hemmed.
LOve these pants. Comfy, well made! They are cream colored

评论概述: Good value, super cute on an old lady
评论详情: Super cute on. Not too warm. Doesn’t feel like the old fashioned corduroy. Washed well. Fit nicely.

These are beautiful, black, soft, comfortable corduroy that fit and look good. Legs (thigh, calf, ankle) are very thick with not much butt makes it hard to find nice fitting pants. A little long but pulled up above waist works.
I’m a size 16/18 depending on the brand, bought an XL and they are too small. Cute but light weight and took a REALY LONG TIME to get here.
Did not fit well
They fit!
Fit like a glove and very flattering, I’m always worried to buy online but it was true size and now I have to buy every color!
Runs small
Great fit, just as size chart advised.  Perfect for my 5’3” frame.  Nice color and weight.  Knees didn’t bad after wearing.
I love corduroy and I love these pants. I bought myself three prs. And I also bought two prs. For my mom. They wash and dry well. Nice choice of colors too.

Exactly what I wanted!!! Light weight really soft good quality corduroy is hard to find…. BINGO!!!! So cute! Darling draw string pants… These are not oversized and baggy .. they fit like sweat pants… soooooo comfortable and so adorable I bought the light tan AND the sage green and they are both PERFECT!!!! These are my new go to pants! THEY STE A TEN!!!!💕🌻
I love these pants. I bought large, I'm short and wear size 14 in slacks. I'll roll the bottom and make a cuff. And the fabric is soft. They are comfortable. Great for fall and winter.
I like how they fit. They wear great. Only wish they  came in short size. These are nice and worm
These pants were stylish and versatile.  Bought a second color.  A little long on me, but I’m short so don’t go by that.  Washed up well.  I will be wearing these all winter.

These pants are well-made, the material is good quality and very soft. I'm very happy with them.  I had to buy a size up, but that's because I'm on the plump side, and my issues are mainly in the stomach and the thighs.
These are comfortable, flattering, and fit well. They are not super thick corduroy, but well made. They’re very cute and stylish in the white.
Great little kickarounds . Good price. Comfy
The cords feel like traditional material on the outside, but the inside has a phony plastic feeling.

These pants are so soft, comfy, and also warmer than I expected. They have some stretch to them and also didn’t shrink/tarnish at all in the wash My one qualm is that they are shorter than I would like. They’re too long to be crops or capris, but too short to be full length pants. Ultimately it hasn’t stopped me from wearing them because I like them so much. Also bought them in black!
I really wanted to like these.. like the color and fabric but i am 5’8” and these are way too short.  Also the cut is off on them so even though short they dont feel comfortable on
I am a size 10/12, the L fits but is tight through the waist and thighs.  I prefer a little more room so I'll be exchanging for an XL.  The fabric and color are nice though!
Super comfortable love the look of corduroys. Wouldn’t say it’s the most stylish pants but perfect for running errands. I found that it ran true to size
The pants are too small, even though They were ordered in my size.  I just got them as a present 3 pairs, how do I exchange them for a larger size
My sister ordered these pants and they fit her perfectly. Warm and comfortable and look nice on. Great quality.
Cute and comfortable.  Not your average corduroy pants. Softer and lighter.
Comfort, warmth, style. Dry until damp, then hang to finish to avoid slight shrinkage. Third pair bought. Love them!
She really like the pants and planning on ordering another pair.

These pants can easily be dressed up or more casual, feel high quality, and are a medium-thick material. The front deep-pockets are nice for being womens! However, I’m 5’6” and they hit the ankle nicely, but not long enough to roll for that cute aesthetic 🤧
Bought these for my mom she likes them highly recomend

评论概述: Emphasizes curves and seams are off
评论详情: Fit wasn’t what I was hoping for. I have thick thighs and like a gender neutral looking pant with a loose fit. I have a few pairs but these aren’t that. The front crotch feels very long but in the back the seam feels too high so you have a wedgy. The general shape of the pant reminds me of old school flair jeans from the early 2000s except the bottom part of the pant doenst flair out. I was hoping for a loose straight leg look that didn’t emphasize curves.
Just right weight.  They are rolled up on the pix, I thought they had a cuff, but cute anyway!
Fit well, attractive, well made
The pants are soft and very comfortable. Fit nicely with the right amount of room.

评论概述: 5”4 189lbs, fit is good through the length ok for me.  Not to long, covers top of shoes.
评论详情: I like that they fit!  Haven't worn or washed them yet.
I absolutely love these pants! They are true to size and super comfortable!
A little rough on the skin but overall these are very cute and pretty comfortable
Great fit!!!  Comfy
I bought these with comfort in mind. I am very happy with this purchase.
love these! and the fit is amazing!
I’m curve and these are unflattering. Boxy leg makes me look short n round. Material does not give. Cute in picture.
Very soft, nice fabric,  but too tight. Twenty eight inch waist used to be a size small. Now that's a medium? I should have got a large.
Just what I was looking for! Easy to pull on and go, but looks more pulled together than leggings or sweatpants.
Fit well
I don’t get why this is such a highly returned item. The fabric is great. The fit is great. 5’4” 170 lbs.
I’m 5’ 3” and these pants have the perfect length (when worn with tennis shoes). I want them in every color.
I love these so much I’ve already gotten them in two colors and plan to get more!
